data.actual_result: The window is moved to the left, the left edges are cut and there is a space on the bottom and right side of the pop-up.
data.expected_result: The pop-up window is properly opened with no issues.
data.short_description: Mini screen view moves every pop-up window in the app, cutting all the edges and adding random spaces. (EMUI exclusive)
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Mini Screen View from your phone settings. - Go to Discord and activate the Mini Screen. - Click on anything that opens a pop-up window (User Profile, Server Settings, Channel Settings, etc). - Obverse.
